doc:
Linda Hamilton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linda_Hamilton 0 Linda Carroll Hamilton (born September 26, 1956) is an American actress best known for her portrayal of Sarah Connor in The Terminator film series and Catherine Chandler in the television series Beauty and the Beast (1987-1990), for which she was nominated for two Golden Globe Awards and an Emmy Award. She also starred as Vicky in the horror film Children of the Corn. Hamilton had a recurring role as Mary Elizabeth Bartowski on NBC's Chuck. Linda_Carroll_Hamilton ( born September_26_,_1956 ) is an_American_actress best_known for her_portrayal of Sarah_Connor in The_Terminator_film_series and Catherine_Chandler in the_television_series_Beauty and the_Beast ( 1987-1990 ) , for which she was_nominated for two_Golden_Globe_Awards and an_Emmy_Award . She also starred as Vicky in the_horror_film_Children of the_Corn . Hamilton had a_recurring_role as Mary_Elizabeth_Bartowski on NBC 's_Chuck .
